Stop OpenView Monitoring and EMC Storwatch on AIX Servers

## Stop OpenView Monitoring on AIX Server ## 

sudo /usr/lpp/OV/bin/ovc -kill
sudo /usr/lpp/perf/bin/ovpa -stop
sudo /usr/lpp/perf/bin/pctl stop
sudo /etc/rc.agent stop

To stop Openview from Starting at Reboot changewait to off in te following lines in /etc/inittab 

OVCtrl:2:wait:/etc/rc.d/OVCtrl start >/dev/console  # Start Agent
ovpa:2:wait:/etc/rc.ovpa start >/dev/console  # Start OV Performance Agent

## Stop EMC Storewatch Daemon on AIX Servers ## 

sudo /usr/symcli/bin/stordaemon shutdown storwatchd
sudo /usr/symcli/bin/stordaemon shutdown storapid
sudo /usr/emc/API/symapi stop
